Description: Body sherd of black-figured North Ionian pottery plate; interior: whitish slip; head of bearded man (red hat, spoked wheel earring?) to left with slanting object (sword?) in front of him; part of a tondo composition; underside: unglazed with some ridging preserved.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GG.814)
